description: This file contains API functions related to authentication, including user registration, login, and fetching current user profile.

methods.name: register({ email, password, roles })
methods.description: Registers a new user by sending a POST request to /auth/register with email, password, and roles.

methods.name: login({ email, password })
methods.description: Logs in a user by sending a POST request to /auth/login with email and password.

methods.name: getMe({ token })
methods.description: Retrieves the current user's profile information via GET /auth/me.

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^export async function register({ email, password, roles }) {$/
